name: Danish Dewani
summary: To get a growth-oriented fulltime position in a reputed organization where I can enhance myself and my skills can be utilized for improvement and success of the organization.

experience.title: Consultant / Senior Web Developer
experience.description: Interaction with clients and internal team to define scope of work, Stacks, timelines and deliverables. Developed multiple CMS and Framework based projects, campaign and contest sites. Created custom plugins and add-on features for popular CMS (WordPress, Magento). Setup and deployment of projects on server, Optimization of server resources and performance.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Implemented changes on client’s web application as per provided requirements.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Collecting requirements and defining scope of work. Project architecture and database design. Worked closely with relevant teams internally to ensure alignment and coordination across operations for seamless implementation of existing and new systems.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Single-handedly developed and deployed multiple portals, MVP and websites for company’s venture. Converted requirements to visual UI and then implemented them as a live product/project. Implemented multiple REST API to sync data with CRM and automated customised responses for prospects. Developed 4 different real-estate portal with lead generation, Coworking listing/booking/invoice management portal, Magento based custom eCommerce for jewellery venture.

experience.title: Senior Developer
experience.description: Developed cloud based free printing platform with automated Ads printing. Created a portal to print data based upon user preference and allow printing custom data based upon available free/paid credits. Created algorithms and implemented them to optimize ads placement on multiple printing kiosk and web portals. Managed 3 remote developers working from Bangalore. Created frontend based on provided wireframes. Development of Ads management portal for clients along with recharge wallet system in order to provide hassle free ads publishing and analytics.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Managed and maintained all static/dynamic content and pages of existing site. QA and fixes of issues on existing site. Improved performance of e-contest portal. Designing social media creatives and posters for upcoming event. Hiring and training interns for upcoming events. Created curriculum for various tech courses and module wise creation of sample projects.

projects.title: Various Ventures
projects.description: Single-handedly developed and deployed multiple portals, MVP and websites for company’s venture. Converted requirements to visual UI and then implemented them as a live product/project. Implemented multiple REST API to sync data with CRM and automated customised responses for prospects. Developed 4 different real-estate portal with lead generation, Coworking listing/booking/invoice management portal, Magento based custom eCommerce for jewellery venture.
